entry.title: Connect-IO: a project for Connected Objects
entry.content:
Connect-IO project officially starts today! :D

The Connect-IO project, labelled by the ANR agency, has been accepted in the IDEFI-N call, founded by the PIA (Programme d'Investissements d'Avenir). The consortium is composed of all INSA institutes (Toulouse, Lyon, Rennes, Rouen, Strasbourg, Centre Val de Loire, FÃ¨z) and the OpenClassrooms startup.

This project aims at developing a set of MOOCs and SPOCs dedicated to connected objects. DynaMid team is participating to the steering comity of the project.
